types.html:
platin m (plural platins)

  1. mudflat, a flat area of sandy or rocky land lying in the intertidal zone, and hence appearing at low tide
  2. (Louisiana) a prairie pothole, a buffalo wallow, a circular pool of water embedded within a grassland
trans: mudflat, a flat area of sandy or rocky land lying in the intertidal zone, and hence appearing at low tide
a prairie pothole, a buffalo wallow, a circular pool of water embedded within a grassland

title: platin
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /pla.tɛ̃/
